title: Drawing, "National Benzole Mixture, British Petroleum, Ltd.", 1935
medium: Airbrush and paint, brush and gouache, pen and black ink, collage on paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A gloved hand is seen pushing a button with the thumb. Steering wheel abstractly rendered. Title in orange and brown: NATIONAL / BENZOLE MIXTURE / FOR / STARTABILITY. Trade symbol of Nation Benzole Mixture, left center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "National Benzole Mixture, British Petroleum, Ltd.", 1935.
1935. Airbrush and paint, brush and gouache, pen and black ink, collage on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-551.
